column5: Located in a quiet neighborhood, with easy access to freeways directly mid-point from Dallas or Fort Worth. With a very large floor plan, you will have plenty of space to relax and feel at home. Our home also serves as a great place to enjoy all of the surrounding attractions. The house is a very short drive to At&t (Cowboy) stadium, Rangers Ballpark, Lone Star Park, Six Flags over Texas, Hurricane Harbor, Joe Pool Lake and much more.
column8: Spacious 4 Bedroom in Heart of DFW
